moves.2. d3 d5 3. exd5 exd5 4. Nf3 Bg4 5. h3 Q: I think that BxN would have been a better move at this time, because it would ruin the kingside pawn structure
moves.12... Kd7 13. c3 c6 14. Nd2 Na6 15. d4 R: Gaining space on the queen side
moves.16... Rxe1+ 17. Rxe1 Re8 18. Rxe8: Didn't want him to keep his rook on the open file and didn't want to protect my rook
moves.25... Ne6: putting pressure on the d4 pawn
moves.26. Nxa5 c5: !? this move is good at first site but it ends up leading to an equal trade
moves.27. Bg4: I spent alot of time on this move but finally found a solution
moves.27... cxd4 28. Bxe6 fxe6 29. cxd4 Kc7 30: working my way towards the g pawn
moves.37... Kc6 38. Ke5 Bd8 39. Kf5 Bb6 40. Kx: I liked the trade of pawns here because it moved the bishop to a less active square
moves.48... Bf4 49. Ke4 Bg5 50. Ke5 Kb5 51. Ke: Black resigns. This was my third win at the tournament and had surpassed my goals after only getting 2.5 points the year before on 5th board I now had 3 on second.

gameName: WA State High School Team Tournament
